line_of_business: Industry and Trading of Goods So Household Needs
company_overview: PT Soraya Berjaya Indonesia Tbk ("Company") is the largest bedroom equipment manufacturer in the city of Padang, West Sumatra, which was established since 2001. The company offers several bedroom products such as bed linen, bed covers, pillows and bolsters, and household accessories. Starting a business from a micro -scale convection with a production location in Padang, in 2015, the company turned into a legal entity in the form of a PT with the main business as a bedroom equipment producer that has a production center in Padang City, on Jl Palangkaraya No. 9, RT 004/RW 016, Desa/Kelurahan Surau Gadang, Kec. Nanggalo, Padang, West Sumatra.
address: Jl. Bandes, Keluarahan Aie Pacah, Kecamatan Koto Tangah, Kota Padang, Sumatera Barat 25176
